The #Ethereum miners are voting to increase the Block Gas Limit from 10,000,000 to 12,500,000. ⛏️  In theory, this means that the Ethereum network now has the capabilities to handle ~44 transactions per second, instead of ~35.   Another huge milestone for the community.🥳🎉
